title: Drawing, September 1844
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed with date in graphite, at upper right: Sep 1844;  and below: View of the Kaanterskill.; again, at lower right: woods, gravelly beach.  
Verso: Inscribed with date in graphite, at center:  Oct 1844.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of a broad hilly landscape vista, with a stream in the center flowing into the foreground; houses visible. 

Verso: A farmer seen from the back (shown twice) and a large tree in leaf.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, September 1844.
September 1844. Graphite on white paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1402.
